metadata.name: Texts from Mittens
metadata.description: Follow along with Mittens as he enjoys hilarious, snark-filled text volleys with his cast of quirky friends and family: Earl (the "filthy hound"), Stumpy (the best friend), Drunky Patty (the usually tipsy next-door neighbor), Grandma (giver of treats), and Fiona (Mitty's girlfriend). Based on Angie Bailey's virally popular blog, Texts from Mittens: The Friends and Family Edition is feline humor at its finest.
